metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9843 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
The crc32_big function in crc32.c in zlib 1.2.8 might allowcontext-dependent attackers to have unspecified impact via vectorsinvolving big-endian CRC calculation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9843` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lib32z1 - 1:1.2.11.dfsg-0ubuntu2
lib64z1 - 1:1.2.11.dfsg-0ubuntu2
libx32z1 - 1:1.2.11.dfsg-0ubuntu2
zlib1g - 1:1.2.11.dfsg-0ubuntu2
No subscription required

rsync - 3.1.2-2.1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zlib package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.2.11.dfsg-0ubuntu2').
rsync package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-2.1ubuntu1.1').
